subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gilbert Arenas scored 12 of his 20 points in a fourth-quarter blitz by Washington as the host Wizards defeated the Philadelphia 76ers, 109-93, on Saturday night.
snippet: Gilbert Arenas scored 12 of his 20 points in a fourth-quarter blitz by Washington as the host Wizards defeated the Philadelphia 76ers, 109-93, on Saturday night.
